archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1055
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Payments specialist, I want the ability to send a copy of the invoice quickly and efficiently via email and have a reference of this interaction automatically added to the account

properties.value: Where copy of the invoice should be send to? Payments specialist or maybe it is just a copy for customer? A copy for the customer. Does not have to be marked as "copy". Maybe for Frotnend employess too. Efficienty = push it without having to opening and saving.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
